Html:
Hello community,

I'm trying to draw direct lines between two markers. As I know there's no direct way to do that. Then, I decided to draw polygon however I'm not able to do that. Tried to add polygon to marker then add the marker to map but the problem is that I can't add polygon to marker. Can you help please. I'm using WPF hot build, 20150501, which I the newest.

Thanks in advance.

Just added GMapRoute to mymap like adding GMapMarker.

Thanks!
